sentences.en: a feeling of doubt and uncertainty
A great deal of uncertainty exists as the best method.
sentences.cn: 很难说什么是最好的方法.

sentences.en: After six weeks of uncertainty , the strain was beginning to take its toll.
sentences.cn: 6个星期的忐忑不安后, 压力开始产生影响了.

sentences.en: Around every corner lurked doubt and uncertainty.
sentences.cn: 每个角落都暗藏着疑虑和不安。

sentences.en: As people grow older, they begin to ruminate on the uncertainty of life.
sentences.cn: 随着年龄的增长, 人们开始对生活的变化无常冥思苦想.

sentences.en: Her comments will add to the uncertainty of the situation.
sentences.cn: 她的批评将会使局势更加不稳定.

sentences.en: In the case of uncertainty, the definition of rationality becomes problematic.
sentences.cn: 在非确定型的情况, 合理性的概念却难以确定.

sentences.en: Is the total energy of the universe subject to the uncertainty principle?
sentences.cn: 宇宙的总能量是否也要服从测不准原理?

sentences.en: It is the uncertainty that charms one. A mist makes things wonderful.
sentences.cn: 模棱两可才动人呐, 雾能使事物显得更美.

sentences.en: Let us approach the uncertainty principle from another point of view.
sentences.cn: 让我们用另一种观点来探讨测不准原理.

sentences.en: Li Chuang - fei's voice betrayed a, slight uncertainty.
sentences.cn: 李壮飞那口气有些软了.

sentences.en: Questions involving the environment are particularly prone to uncertainty.
sentences.cn: 涉及到环境的问题尤其可能产生不确定性.

sentences.en: The uncertainty created by this situation must be confusing for you.
sentences.cn: 这种局面所造成的不确定性肯定让你感到困惑。

sentences.en: There is considerable uncertainty about the company's future.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的前景相当渺茫。

sentences.en: Times of great change are also times of uncertainty.
sentences.cn: 发生巨大变革的时期也是动荡的时期。

sentences.en: Uncertainty is a discouragement to investment.
sentences.cn: 不确定性令投资者裹足不前。

words.tran_cn: 不确定地；没把握地；犹豫地

phrases.tran_cn: 定性分析；不确定性分析

trans.tran_cn: 无把握，不确定，不可靠，不确实知道，半信半疑，无把握、不确定的事物
trans.tran_en: when you feel doubt about what will happen
